00059 /* initializes the random number table */
00060 void SeedRandom(ULong seed);
00061 
00062 /* generate a random 32bit unsigned int */ 
00063 UInt RandomInt(void);
00064 
00065 /******************************************************************************/
00066 /* End of Makoto Matsumoto and Takuji Nishimura Random Number Generator       */
00067 /******************************************************************************/
00068 
00069 // generates a random real number on [0,1]-real-interval 
00070 Real RandomUnitReal(void);
00071 
00072 // generates a random real number on [0,1)-real-interval 
00073 Real RandomUnitOpenReal(void);
00074 
00075 // generates a random real number on [-1,1] 
00076 inline Real RandomSymmetricReal(void)
00077 {
00078     return (Real)(2.0*RandomUnitReal() - 1.0);
00079 }
00080 
00081 // generates a random real number on [-min, max] 
00082 inline Real RandomIntervalReal(Real fMin, Real fMax)
00083 {
00084     return fMin+(fMax-fMin)*((Real)RandomUnitReal());
00085 }
00086 //******************************************************************************
00087 
00088 } // end namespace: dg
